full_summary:
### Tender Announcement: IT Professional Services for BRMS
#### Solicitation No.: WS3999858900-Doc4104193609

**Government of Canada Procurement Announcement**

Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
Contact: Tracey Miller, [ttmiller@tgsc-pwsocg.gc.ca](mailto:ttmiller@tgsc-pwsocg.gc.ca)

**Solicitation Overview:**
The Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) is seeking IT professional services to support the delivery and management of Agrilnvest and AgriStability applications, as well as the Business Rule Management System (BRMS) application framework. This solicitation is open to all eligible suppliers.

**Tender Details:**

- **Notice Type:** RFP (Request for Proposal) against Supply Arrangement
- **Method of Procurement:** Competitive, Selective Tendering
- **Contract End Date:** None specified
- **Contract Start Date:** None specified
- **Trade Agreements:** This solicitation is subject to various international trade agreements, including the Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement and the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement.
- **Delivery Regions:** The contract will be delivered across Canada.

**Evaluation Criteria:**

The contract will be awarded to the bidder with the highest combined rating for technical merit and price.

**Documents:**
This solicitation is not bundled with any ancillary documents. Interested suppliers can view the solicitation and supporting information on the Discovery website.

**Deadline:**

Tenders must be submitted electronically on the Discovery website by **September 20, 2023, 2:00 PM ET**.

Note: I assumed the contractor meant "Eastern Time."
